column4: trying to update and getting error message, "need more disk space" ??  anyone help?
ha ha, yes, i've got a dual boot with vista, got a 320gb hdd so plenty of room, just don't know how to increase for ubuntu
hansard_: did that but it says i don't have rights to use gparted
you could put a folder on the ntfs partition and put data in there, using the ntfs space
